definition: lit. you can't expect the horse to run fast but not let it graze (idiom)/fig. you can't have your cake and eat it, too
pinyin: you4 yao4 ma3 'r pao3 , you4 yao4 ma3 'r bu4 chi1 cao3
simplified: 又要马儿跑，又要马儿不吃草
word: 又要馬兒跑，又要馬兒不吃草
